   605â†’# ============================================================================
   606â†’# CRITICAL FIX: Correct directory structure for Agent Skills
   607â†’# ============================================================================
   608â†’
   609â†’# Determine installation root
   610â†’if [ "$STRATEGY" = "symlink" ]; then
   611â†’    # Multi-platform: use ~/.wfc as source of truth
   612â†’    WFC_ROOT="$HOME/.wfc"
   613â†’    echo -e "${BLUE}Root directory:${RESET} $WFC_ROOT (source of truth)"
   614â†’else
   615â†’    # Direct install to single platform
   616â†’    # CRITICAL: For single platform, install DIRECTLY to platform skills dir
   617â†’    # NOT nested under a wfc/ subdirectory
   618â†’    for platform in "${!INSTALL_TO[@]}"; do
   619â†’        # Install directly to platform path, NOT nested
   620â†’        WFC_ROOT="${PLATFORM_PATHS[$platform]}"
   621â†’    done
   622â†’    echo -e "${BLUE}Installing to:${RESET} $WFC_ROOT"
   623â†’fi
   624â†’
   625â†’# Create installation directory
   626â†’mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT"
   627â†’
   628â†’# Save branding mode config
   629â†’cat > "$WFC_ROOT/.wfc_branding" <<EOF
   630â†’# WFC Branding Configuration
   631â†’# Generated by install-universal.sh v${VERSION}
   632â†’mode=$WFC_MODE
   633â†’name=$WFC_NAME
   634â†’tagline=$WFC_TAGLINE
   635â†’EOF
   636â†’
   637â†’echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Saved branding mode: ${WFC_MODE}"
   638â†’
   639â†’# Copy WFC files
   640â†’echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ“¦ Installing WFC...${RESET}"
   641â†’echo ""
   642â†’
   643â†’# Determine source directory
   644â†’SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
   645â†’
   646â†’# ============================================================================
   647â†’# CRITICAL FIX: Correct skill installation structure
   648â†’# ============================================================================
   649â†’
   650â†’echo "  â€¢ Installing skills..."
   651â†’
   652â†’if [ "$STRATEGY" = "symlink" ]; then
   653â†’    # Multi-platform: copy to ~/.wfc/skills first
   654â†’    mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/skills"
   655â†’
   656â†’    SKILLS_FOUND=0
   657â†’
   658â†’    # Check local skills directory (in wfc/skills)
   659â†’    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills" ]; then
   660â†’        for skill_dir in "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills"/wfc-*; do
   661â†’            if [ -d "$skill_dir" ]; then
   662â†’                skill_name=$(basename "$skill_dir")
   663â†’                echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name"
   664â†’                # Remove old version if exists
   665â†’                [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/skills/$skill_name" ] && rm -rf "$WFC_ROOT/skills/$skill_name"
   666â†’                cp -r "$skill_dir" "$WFC_ROOT/skills/"
   667â†’                SKILLS_FOUND=$((SKILLS_FOUND + 1))
   668â†’            fi
   669â†’        done
   670â†’    fi
   671â†’
   672â†’    # Check ~/.claude/skills for already installed WFC skills
   673â†’    if [ -d "$HOME/.claude/skills" ]; then
   674â†’        for skill_dir in "$HOME/.claude/skills"/wfc-*; do
   675â†’            if [ -d "$skill_dir" ]; then
   676â†’                skill_name=$(basename "$skill_dir")
   677â†’                # Check if this is a meta-skill directory (contains sub-skills)
   678â†’                if [ -d "$skill_dir/wkills" ]; then
   679â†’                    # Meta-skill - install directly to skills root
   680â†’                    target="$WFC_ROOT/skills/"
   681â†’                    echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name (meta-skill from ~/.claude/skills)"
   682â†’                    if [ ! -d "$target" ]; then
   683â†’                        mkdir -p "$target"
   684â†’                    fi
   685â†’                    cp -r "$skill_dir"/* "$target/" 2>/dev/null || true
   686â†’                    SKILLS_FOUND=$((SKILLS_FOUND + 1))
   687â†’                else
   688â†’                    # Regular skill - install in skills subdirectory
   689â†’                    target="$WFC_ROOT/skills/"
   690â†’                    if [ ! -d "$target/$skill_name" ]; then
   691â†’                        mkdir -p "$target/$skill_name"
   692â†’                        echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name"
   693â†’                    else
   694â†’                        echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name (already exists)"
   695â†’                    fi
   696â†’                fi
   697â†’            fi
   698â†’        done
   699â†’    fi
   700â†’
   701â†’    echo "  â€¢ Found $SKILLS_FOUND WFC skills"
   702â†’
   703â†’    # Copy reviewers (5 fixed specialist reviewers)
   704â†’    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/references/reviewers" ]; then
   705â†’        echo "  â€¢ Installing reviewers..."
   706â†’        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/reviewers"
   707â†’        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/references/reviewers"/* "$WFC_ROOT/reviewers/"
   708â†’    fi
   709â†’
   710â†’    # Copy hooks infrastructure
   711â†’    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks" ]; then
   712â†’        echo "  â€¢ Installing hook infrastructure..."
   713â†’        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/scripts/hooks"
   714â†’        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks"/* "$WFC_ROOT/scripts/hooks/"
   715â†’    fi
   716â†’
   717â†’    # Copy templates
   718â†’    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/assets/templates" ]; then
   719â†’        echo "  â€¢ Installing templates..."
   720â†’        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/templates"
   721â†’        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/assets/templates"/* "$WFC_ROOT/templates/"
   722â†’    fi
   723â†’
   724â†’    # Preserve user rules (never overwrite)
   725â†’    if [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/rules" ]; then
   726â†’        echo "  â€¢ Preserving user rules (.wfc/rules/)"
   727â†’    fi
   728â†’
   729â†’else
   730â†’    # Direct mode: install skills DIRECTLY to platform skills directory
   731â†’    # CRITICAL: Skills must be at ~/.claude/skills/wfc-*/ NOT ~/.claude/skills/wfc/skills/wfc-*/
   732â†’
   733â†’    SKILLS_FOUND=0
   734â†’
   735â†’    # Check local skills directory (in wfc/skills)
   736â†’    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills" ]; then
   737â†’        for skill_dir in "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills"/wfc-*; do
   738â†’            if [ -d "$skill_dir" ]; then
   739â†’                skill_name=$(basename "$skill_dir")
   740â†’                target="$WFC_ROOT/$skill_name"
   741â†’                echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name"
   742â†’                # Remove old version if exists
   743â†’                [ -d "$target" ] && rm -rf "$target"
   744â†’                cp -r "$skill_dir" "$target"
   745â†’                SKILLS_FOUND=$((SKILLS_FOUND + 1))
   746â†’            fi
   747â†’        done
   748â†’    fi
   749â†’
   750â†’    # Check ~/.claude/skills for already installed WFC skills
   751â†’    if [ -d "$HOME/.claude/skills" ]; then
   752â†’        for skill_dir in "$HOME/.claude/skills"/wfc-*; do
   753â†’            if [ -d "$skill_dir" ]; then
   754â†’                skill_name=$(basename "$skill_dir")
   755â†’                target="$WFC_ROOT/$skill_name"
   756â†’                if [ ! -d "$target" ]; then
   757â†’                    echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name (from ~/.claude/skills)"
   758â†’                    cp -r "$skill_dir" "$target"
   759â†’                    SKILLS_FOUND=$((SKILLS_FOUND + 1))
   760â†’                fi
   761â†’            fi
   762â†’        done
   763â†’    fi
   764â†’
   765â†’    echo "  â€¢ Found $SKILLS_FOUND WFC skills"
   766â†’
   767â†’    # Copy reviewers (5 fixed specialist reviewers)
   768â†’    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/references/reviewers" ]; then
   769â†’        echo "  â€¢ Installing reviewers..."
   770â†’        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/references/reviewers"
   771â†’        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/references/reviewers"/* "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/references/reviewers/"
   772â†’    fi
   773â†’
   774â†’    # Copy hooks infrastructure
   775â†’    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks" ]; then
   776â†’        echo "  â€¢ Installing hook infrastructure..."
   777â†’        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/scripts/hooks"
   778â†’        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks"/* "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/scripts/hooks/"
   779â†’    fi
   780â†’
   781â†’    # Copy templates
   782â†’    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/assets/templates" ]; then
   783â†’        echo "  â€¢ Installing templates..."
   784â†’        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/templates"
   785â†’        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/assets/templates"/* "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/templates/"
   786â†’    fi
   787â†’
   788â†’    # Preserve user rules (never overwrite)
   789â†’    if [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/rules" ]; then
   790â†’        echo "  â€¢ Preserving user rules (.wfc/rules/)"
   791â†’    fi
   792â†’fi
   793â†’
   794â†’echo ""
   795â†’
   796â†’# Create symlinks if multi-platform installation
   797â†’if [ "$STRATEGY" = "symlink" ]; then
   798â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ”— Creating symlinks...${RESET}"
   799â†’    echo ""
   800â†’
   801â†’    for platform in "${!INSTALL_TO[@]}"; do
   802â†’        platform_path="${PLATFORM_PATHS[$platform]}"
   803â†’
   804â†’        case $platform in
   805â†’            claude) name="Claude Code" ;;
   806â†’            kiro) name="Kiro" ;;
   807â†’            opencode) name="OpenCode" ;;
   808â†’            cursor) name="Cursor" ;;
   809â†’            vscode) name="VS Code" ;;
   810â†’            codex) name="OpenAI Codex" ;;
   811â†’            antigravity) name="Google Antigravity" ;;
   812â†’            goose) name="Goose" ;;
   813â†’        esac
   814â†’
   815â†’        echo -e "${CYAN}â†’ $name${RESET}"
   816â†’
   817â†’        # Create platform skills directory
   818â†’        mkdir -p "$platform_path"
   819â†’
   820â†’        # Link each skill DIRECTLY to platform skills directory
   821â†’        for skill in "$WFC_ROOT/skills"/wfc-*; do
   822â†’            if [ -d "$skill" ]; then
   823â†’                skill_name=$(basename "$skill")
   824â†’                target="$platform_path/$skill_name"
   825â†’
   826â†’                # Remove existing
   827â†’                if [ -L "$target" ] || [ -d "$target" ]; then
   828â†’                    rm -rf "$target"
   829â†’                fi
   830â†’
   831â†’                # Create symlink
   832â†’                ln -s "$skill" "$target"
   833â†’                echo "  â”œâ”€ $skill_name"
   834â†’            fi
   835â†’        done
   836â†’
   837â†’        # Link shared resources
   838â†’        target="$platform_path/wfc"
   839â†’        mkdir -p "$target"
   840â†’
   841â†’        # Remove existing symlinks
   842â†’        [ -L "$target/personas" ] && rm "$target/personas"
   843â†’        [ -L "$target/shared" ] && rm "$target/shared"
   844â†’        [ -L "$target/scripts" ] && rm "$target/scripts"
   845â†’        [ -L "$target/templates" ] && rm "$target/templates"
   846â†’
   847â†’        # Create symlinks
   848â†’        ln -sf "$WFC_ROOT/personas" "$target/personas"
   849â†’        [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/shared" ] && ln -sf "$WFC_ROOT/shared" "$target/shared"
   850â†’        [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/scripts" ] && ln -sf "$WFC_ROOT/scripts" "$target/scripts"
   851â†’        [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/templates" ] && ln -sf "$WFC_ROOT/templates" "$target/templates"
   852â†’
   853â†’        echo "  â””â”€ Shared resources (personas, hooks, templates)"
   854â†’        echo ""
   855â†’    done
   856â†’fi
   857â†’
   858â†’# ============================================================================
   859â†’# HOOK REGISTRATION: Install PostToolUse quality hooks for Claude Code
   860â†’# ============================================================================
   861â†’if [ "${INSTALL_TO[claude]}" = true ] || [ "${PLATFORMS[claude]}" = true ]; then
   862â†’    echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸª Registering PostToolUse quality hooks...${RESET}"
   863â†’    echo ""
   864â†’
   865â†’    HOOKS_SRC="$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks"
   866â†’    HOOKS_DEST="$HOME/.wfc/scripts/hooks"
   867â†’
   868â†’    if [ -d "$HOOKS_SRC" ]; then
   869â†’        mkdir -p "$HOOKS_DEST"
   870â†’        mkdir -p "$HOOKS_DEST/_checkers"
   871â†’
   872â†’        # Copy hook scripts
   873â†’        for hook_file in file_checker.py tdd_enforcer.py context_monitor.py _util.py register_hooks.py; do
   874â†’            if [ -f "$HOOKS_SRC/$hook_file" ]; then
   875â†’                cp "$HOOKS_SRC/$hook_file" "$HOOKS_DEST/$hook_file"
   876â†’                echo "    â”œâ”€ $hook_file"
   877â†’            fi
   878â†’        done
   879â†’
   880â†’        # Copy language checkers
   881â†’        for checker_file in __init__.py python.py typescript.py go.py; do
   882â†’            if [ -f "$HOOKS_SRC/_checkers/$checker_file" ]; then
   883â†’                cp "$HOOKS_SRC/_checkers/$checker_file" "$HOOKS_DEST/_checkers/$checker_file"
   884â†’                echo "    â”œâ”€ _checkers/$checker_file"
   885â†’            fi
   886â†’        done
   887â†’
   888â†’        # Copy security hooks
   889â†’        for sec_file in pretooluse_hook.py security_hook.py rule_engine.py config_loader.py hook_state.py __init__.py __main__.py; do
   890â†’            if [ -f "$HOOKS_SRC/$sec_file" ]; then
   891â†’                cp "$HOOKS_SRC/$sec_file" "$HOOKS_DEST/$sec_file"
   892â†’            fi
   893â†’        done
   894â†’
   895â†’        # Copy patterns
   896â†’        if [ -d "$HOOKS_SRC/patterns" ]; then
   897â†’            mkdir -p "$HOOKS_DEST/patterns"
   898â†’            cp "$HOOKS_SRC/patterns"/*.json "$HOOKS_DEST/patterns/" 2>/dev/null || true
   899â†’        fi
   900â†’
   901â†’        echo -e "${GREEN}  âœ“${RESET} Quality hooks installed to ~/.wfc/scripts/hooks/"
   902â†’    fi
   903â†’
   904â†’    # Upsert WFC hooks into ~/.claude/settings.json (never clobbers existing settings)
   905â†’    REGISTER_SCRIPT="$HOOKS_DEST/register_hooks.py"
   906â†’    GLOBAL_SETTINGS="$HOME/.claude/settings.json"
   907â†’    if [ -f "$REGISTER_SCRIPT" ]; then
   908â†’        echo "  â€¢ Registering hooks in ~/.claude/settings.json (upsert)..."
   909â†’        if command -v python3 >/dev/null 2>&1; then
   910â†’            python3 "$REGISTER_SCRIPT" "$GLOBAL_SETTINGS"
   911â†’            echo -e "${GREEN}  âœ“${RESET} Hooks registered (existing settings preserved)"
   912â†’        elif command -v python >/dev/null 2>&1; then
   913â†’            python "$REGISTER_SCRIPT" "$GLOBAL_SETTINGS"
   914â†’            echo -e "${GREEN}  âœ“${RESET} Hooks registered (existing settings preserved)"
   915â†’        else
   916â†’            echo -e "${YELLOW}  âš ${RESET} Python not found â€” run manually:"
   917â†’            echo "      python3 $REGISTER_SCRIPT $GLOBAL_SETTINGS"
   918â†’        fi
   919â†’    fi
   920â†’
   921â†’    echo ""
   922â†’fi
   923â†’
   924â†’# Success!
   925â†’echo -e "${GREEN}${BOLD}âœ“ Installation complete!${RESET}"
   926â†’echo ""
   927â†’
   928â†’# Show installation summary
   929â†’echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ“‹ Installation Summary${RESET}"
   930â†’echo ""
   931â†’
   932â†’if [ "$STRATEGY" = "symlink" ]; then
   933â†’    echo -e "${BLUE}Source:${RESET} $WFC_ROOT"
   934â†’    echo ""
   935â†’    echo -e "${BLUE}Symlinked to:${RESET}"
   936â†’    for platform in "${!INSTALL_TO[@]}"; do
   937â†’        case $platform in
   938â†’            claude) name="Claude Code" ;;
   939â†’            kiro) name="Kiro" ;;
   940â†’            opencode) name="OpenCode" ;;
   941â†’            cursor) name="Cursor" ;;
   942â†’            vscode) name="VS Code" ;;
   943â†’            codex) name="OpenAI Codex" ;;
   944â†’            antigravity) name="Google Antigravity" ;;
   945â†’            goose) name="Goose" ;;
   946â†’        esac
   947â†’        echo -e "  â€¢ ${name}: ${PLATFORM_PATHS[$platform]}/wfc-*"
   948â†’    done
   949â†’    echo ""
   950â†’    echo -e "${YELLOW}Note:${RESET} Updates to $WFC_ROOT automatically sync to all platforms"
   951â†’else
   952â†’    echo -e "${BLUE}Location:${RESET} $WFC_ROOT"
   953â†’fi
   954â†’
   955â†’echo ""
   956â†’echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸŽ¯ Available Skills${RESET}"
   957â†’echo ""
   958â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-review${RESET}       - Multi-agent consensus code review"
   959â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-implement${RESET}    - Parallel TDD implementation"
   960â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-plan${RESET}         - Structured task breakdown"
   961â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-test${RESET}         - Property-based test generation"
   962â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-security${RESET}     - STRIDE threat modeling"
   963â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-architecture${RESET} - C4 diagrams & ADRs"
   964â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-observe${RESET}      - Observability instrumentation"
   965â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-retro${RESET}        - AI-powered retrospectives"
   966â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-safeclaude${RESET}   - Safe command allowlist"
   967â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-safeguard${RESET}    - Real-time security hooks"
   968â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-rules${RESET}        - Custom enforcement rules"
   969â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-playground${RESET}   - Interactive HTML playgrounds"
   970â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-validate${RESET}     - Critical thinking advisor"
   971â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-pr-comments${RESET} - PR comment triage & fix"
   972â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-newskill${RESET}     - Create new WFC skills"
   973â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-init${RESET}        - Project initialization tool"
   974â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-vibe${RESET}         - Natural brainstorming mode"
   975â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-sync${RESET}        - Sync rules & discover patterns"
   976â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-agentic${RESET}     - GitHub Agentic Workflows (gh-aw)"
   977â†’echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-ba${RESET}          - Business analysis & requirements"
   978â†’
   979â†’echo ""
   980â†’echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸš€ Next Steps${RESET}"
   981â†’echo ""
   982â†’
   983â†’for platform in "${!INSTALL_TO[@]}"; do
   984â†’    case $platform in
   985â†’        claude)
   986â†’            echo -e "  ${GREEN}Claude Code:${RESET}"
   987â†’            echo -e "    claude"
   988â†’            echo -e "    /wfc-review"
   989â†’            echo ""
   990â†’            ;;
   991â†’        kiro)
   992â†’            echo -e "  ${GREEN}Kiro:${RESET}"
   993â†’            echo -e "    kiro"
   994â†’            echo -e "    /wfc-review"
   995â†’            echo ""
   996â†’            ;;
   997â†’        opencode)
   998â†’            echo -e "  ${GREEN}OpenCode:${RESET}"
   999â†’            echo -e "    opencode"
  1000â†’            echo -e "    /wfc-review"
  1001â†’            echo ""
  1002â†’            ;;
  1003â†’        cursor)
  1004â†’            echo -e "  ${GREEN}Cursor:${RESET}"
  1005â†’            echo -e "    Open Cursor"
  1006â†’            echo -e "    /wfc-review"
  1007â†’            echo ""
  1008â†’            ;;
  1009â†’        vscode)
  1010â†’            echo -e "  ${GREEN}VS Code:${RESET}"
  1011â†’            echo -e "    code ."
  1012â†’            echo -e "    /wfc-review"
  1013â†’            echo ""
  1014â†’            ;;
  1015â†’        codex)
  1016â†’            echo -e "  ${GREEN}OpenAI Codex:${RESET}"
  1017â†’            echo -e "    codex"
  1018â†’            echo -e "    /wfc-review"
  1019â†’            echo ""
  1020â†’            ;;
  1021â†’        antigravity)
  1022â†’            echo -e "  ${GREEN}Google Antigravity:${RESET}"
  1023â†’            echo -e "    antigravity"
  1024â†’            echo -e "    /wfc-review"
  1025â†’            echo ""
  1026â†’            ;;
  1027â†’        goose)
  1028â†’            echo -e "  ${GREEN}Goose:${RESET}"
  1029â†’            echo -e "    goose"
  1030â†’            echo -e "    /wfc-review"
  1031â†’            echo ""
  1032â†’            ;;
  1033â†’    esac
  1034â†’done
  1035â†’
  1036â†’echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ“š Documentation${RESET}"
  1037â†’echo ""
  1038â†’echo -e "  â€¢ README:    ${CYAN}https://github.com/sam-fakhreddine/wfc${RESET}"
  1039â†’echo -e "  â€¢ Install:   ${CYAN}$SCRIPT_DIR/docs/workflow/UNIVERSAL_INSTALL.md${RESET}"
  1040â†’echo -e "  â€¢ Personas:  ${CYAN}$SCRIPT_DIR/docs/quality/PERSONAS.md${RESET}"
  1041â†’
  1042â†’echo ""
  1043â†’if [ "$WFC_MODE" = "sfw" ]; then
  1044â†’    echo -e "${GREEN}${BOLD}This is Workflow Champion.${RESET} ðŸ†"
  1045â†’else

  1049â†’

#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -e

# Require bash 4+ for associative arrays (declare -A)
if [ "${BASH_VERSINFO[0]}" -lt 4 ]; then
    for candidate in /opt/homebrew/bin/bash /usr/local/bin/bash; do
        if [ -x "$candidate" ]; then
            exec "$candidate" "$0" "$@"
        fi
    done
    echo "Error: bash 4+ required. Install with: brew install bash"
    exit 1
fi

# WFC Universal Installer - Agent Skills Standard Compatible
# Detects and installs to: Claude Code, Kiro, OpenCode, Cursor, VS Code, Codex, Antigravity
#
# Usage:
#   ./install-universal.sh              - Interactive (local clone)
#   ./install-universal.sh --ci         - Non-interactive CI mode
#   ./install-universal.sh --help       - Show help
#
# Remote install:
#   curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sam-fakhreddine/wfc/main/install-universal.sh | bash
#
# Features:
#   - Auto-detects installed Agent Skills platforms
#   - Supports 8+ platforms (Claude Code, Kiro, OpenCode, etc.)
#   - Remote install via curl pipe (clones repo to /tmp)
#   - Branding modes: SFW (Workflow Champion) or NSFW (World Fucking Class)
#   - PostToolUse quality hooks (auto-lint, TDD, context monitor)
#   - Reinstall options: refresh, change branding, or full reset
#   - Progressive disclosure (92% token reduction)
#   - Symlink support for multi-platform sync

VERSION="0.7.0"
REPO="sam-fakhreddine/wfc"
REPO_URL="https://github.com/${REPO}.git"

# Non-interactive mode flag
CI_MODE=false
if [ "$1" = "--ci" ] || [ "$1" = "--non-interactive" ]; then
    CI_MODE=true
fi

# Show help
if [ "$1" = "--help" ] || [ "$1" = "-h" ]; then
    cat << 'EOF'
WFC Universal Installer v0.6.0
==============================

USAGE:
    ./install.sh                 Interactive installation
    ./install.sh --help          Show this help
    ./install.sh --ci            Non-interactive CI mode

FEATURES:
    - Auto-detects Agent Skills platforms
    - Branding modes: SFW or NSFW
    - Reinstall options for existing installations
    - Multi-platform symlink support
    - Progressive disclosure (92% token reduction)

CI MODE:
    --ci flag enables non-interactive installation with these defaults:
    - Existing install: Refresh (keep settings)
    - Branding: NSFW (World Fucking Class)
    - Platform: All detected platforms (uses symlink strategy)

SUPPORTED PLATFORMS:
    - Claude Code     (~/.claude/skills)
    - Kiro (AWS)      (~/.kiro/skills)
    - OpenCode        (~/.opencode/skills)
    - Cursor          (~/.cursor/skills)
    - VS Code         (~/.vscode/skills)
    - OpenAI Codex    (~/.codex/skills)
    - Antigravity     (~/.antigravity/skills)
    - Goose           (~/.config/goose/skills)

REINSTALL OPTIONS:
    When existing installation detected:
    1. Refresh         - Update files, keep settings
    2. Change branding - Switch SFW/NSFW mode
    3. Full reinstall  - Reset all settings (with backup)
    4. Cancel          - Exit without changes

BRANDING MODES:
    SFW  (Safe For Work) - "Workflow Champion"
         Professional language, corporate-friendly

    NSFW (Default)       - "World Fucking Class"
         Original branding, no bullshit

DOCUMENTATION:
    Installation:  docs/workflow/UNIVERSAL_INSTALL.md
    Quick Start:   QUICKSTART.md

EOF
    exit 0
fi

BOLD="\033[1m"
GREEN="\033[0;32m"
BLUE="\033[0;34m"
YELLOW="\033[0;33m"
RED="\033[0;31m"
CYAN="\033[0;36m"
MAGENTA="\033[0;35m"
RESET="\033[0m"

# ============================================================================
# REMOTE INSTALL: If running via curl pipe, clone repo first
# ============================================================================
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" 2>/dev/null )" 2>/dev/null && pwd 2>/dev/null )" || SCRIPT_DIR=""
REMOTE_INSTALL=false

if [ -z "$SCRIPT_DIR" ] || [ ! -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills" ]; then
    # Running via curl pipe or from outside repo - clone to /tmp
    REMOTE_INSTALL=true
    CLONE_DIR="/tmp/wfc-install-$$"

    echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ“¡ Remote install - fetching WFC...${RESET}"

    if ! command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo -e "${RED}âœ—${RESET} git is required. Install git first."
        exit 1
    fi

    git clone --depth 1 "$REPO_URL" "$CLONE_DIR" 2>/dev/null
    SCRIPT_DIR="$CLONE_DIR"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} WFC fetched"
    echo ""

    # Cleanup on exit
    trap "rm -rf $CLONE_DIR" EXIT
fi

# ============================================================================
# DEPENDENCY CHECK
# ============================================================================
check_dependencies() {
    local missing=()

    if ! command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        missing+=("uv")
    fi
    if ! command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        missing+=("git")
    fi

    if [ ${#missing[@]} -gt 0 ]; then
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ${RESET}  Optional dependencies not found: ${missing[*]}"

        if [[ " ${missing[*]} " =~ " uv " ]]; then
            echo -e "   Install uv: ${CYAN}curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh${RESET}"
        fi
        echo ""
    fi

    # Check for quality tools (informational)
    local quality_tools=()
    command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("ruff")
    command -v black >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("black")
    command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("prettier")
    command -v eslint >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("eslint")
    command -v gofmt >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("gofmt")

    if [ ${#quality_tools[@]} -gt 0 ]; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Quality tools detected: ${quality_tools[*]}"
    fi
}

echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ† WFC Universal Installer v${VERSION}${RESET}"
echo -e "   ${CYAN}Agent Skills Standard Compatible${RESET}"
echo ""

check_dependencies

# Check for existing installation
EXISTING_INSTALL=false
EXISTING_BRANDING=""
EXISTING_MODE=""

if [ -d "$HOME/.wfc" ]; then
    EXISTING_INSTALL=true
    if [ -f "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" ]; then
        EXISTING_MODE=$(grep "^mode=" "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" | cut -d'=' -f2)
        EXISTING_BRANDING=$(grep "^name=" "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" | cut -d'=' -f2)
    fi
fi

# Reinstall options if existing installation detected
if [ "$EXISTING_INSTALL" = true ]; then

        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ${RESET}  CI mode: Refreshing existing installation..."
        KEEP_SETTINGS=true
        if [ -n "$EXISTING_MODE" ]; then
            WFC_MODE="$EXISTING_MODE"
            if [ "$WFC_MODE" = "sfw" ]; then
                WFC_NAME="Workflow Champion"
                WFC_TAGLINE="Professional Multi-Agent Framework"
            else
                WFC_NAME="World Fucking Class"
                WFC_TAGLINE="Multi-Agent Framework That Doesn't Fuck Around"
            fi
        fi
    else
        # Interactive mode
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ${RESET}  Existing WFC installation detected"
        if [ -n "$EXISTING_BRANDING" ]; then
            echo -e "   Current: ${CYAN}$EXISTING_BRANDING${RESET} (${EXISTING_MODE})"
        fi
        echo ""
        echo -e "${BOLD}What would you like to do?${RESET}"
        echo ""
        echo -e "1) ${GREEN}Refresh installation${RESET} (keep current settings)"
        echo -e "   â””â”€ Update files, preserve branding and config"
        echo ""
        echo -e "2) ${YELLOW}Change branding mode${RESET}"
        echo -e "   â””â”€ Switch between SFW/NSFW, keep everything else"
        echo ""
        echo -e "3) ${RED}Full reinstall${RESET} (reset all settings)"
        echo -e "   â””â”€ Clean install, reconfigure everything"
        echo ""
        echo -e "4) ${BLUE}Cancel${RESET}"
        echo -e "   â””â”€ Exit without changes"
        echo ""
        read -p "Choose (1-4): " REINSTALL_CHOICE

        case $REINSTALL_CHOICE in
            1)
                # Refresh - keep existing settings
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Refreshing installation..."
                KEEP_SETTINGS=true
                if [ -n "$EXISTING_MODE" ]; then
                    WFC_MODE="$EXISTING_MODE"
                    if [ "$WFC_MODE" = "sfw" ]; then
                        WFC_NAME="Workflow Champion"
                        WFC_TAGLINE="Professional Multi-Agent Framework"
                    else
                        WFC_NAME="World Fucking Class"
                        WFC_TAGLINE="Multi-Agent Framework That Doesn't Fuck Around"
                    fi
                fi
                ;;
            2)
                # Change branding
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Changing branding mode..."
                KEEP_SETTINGS=true
                CHANGE_BRANDING=true
                ;;
            3)
                # Full reinstall
                echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ${RESET}  Full reinstall - backing up current config..."
                BACKUP_DIR="$HOME/.wfc_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)"
                mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR"
                if [ -f "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" ]; then
                    cp "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" "$BACKUP_DIR/"
                fi
                # Backup user rules if they exist
                if [ -d "$HOME/.wfc/rules" ]; then
                    cp -r "$HOME/.wfc/rules" "$BACKUP_DIR/rules"
                    echo -e "   Backed up user rules"
                fi
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Backup saved to: ${CYAN}$BACKUP_DIR${RESET}"
                KEEP_SETTINGS=false
                ;;
            4)
                echo -e "${BLUE}Cancelled${RESET}"
                exit 0
                ;;
            *)
                echo -e "${RED}âœ—${RESET} Invalid choice"
                exit 1
                ;;
        esac
        echo ""
    fi
fi

# Branding mode selection (skip if keeping settings and not changing)
if [ "${KEEP_SETTINGS:-false}" = false ] || [ "${CHANGE_BRANDING:-false}" = true ]; then

                WFC_ACRONYM="WFC"
                WFC_TAGLINE="Multi-Agent Framework That Doesn't Fuck Around"

fi

echo ""
echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ† Installing ${WFC_NAME}${RESET}"
echo -e "   ${WFC_TAGLINE}"

# Platform detection

declare -A PLATFORM_PATHS

# Claude Code
if [ -d "$HOME/.claude" ]; then

if [ -d "$HOME/.config/opencode" ] || [ -d "$HOME/.opencode" ]; then

if [ -d "$HOME/.antigravity" ] || [ -d "$HOME/.config/antigravity" ]; then

# Handle no platforms detected
if [ $DETECTED_COUNT -eq 0 ]; then

fi

# Show summary
echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ“Š Detection Summary:${RESET}"

# Build installation menu
echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸŽ¯ Where should WFC be installed?${RESET}"
echo ""

MENU_OPTIONS=()
MENU_PLATFORMS=()
MENU_INDEX=1

# Add individual platform options
for platform in claude kiro opencode cursor vscode codex antigravity goose; do
    if [ "${PLATFORMS[$platform]}" = true ]; then
        case $platform in
            claude) name="Claude Code" ;;
            kiro) name="Kiro (AWS)" ;;
            opencode) name="OpenCode" ;;
            cursor) name="Cursor" ;;
            vscode) name="VS Code" ;;
            codex) name="OpenAI Codex" ;;
            antigravity) name="Google Antigravity" ;;
            goose) name="Goose" ;;
        esac
        echo -e "${MENU_INDEX}) ${name} only"
        MENU_OPTIONS[$MENU_INDEX]="$platform"
        MENU_INDEX=$((MENU_INDEX + 1))
    fi
done

# Add "All detected" option if more than one
if [ $DETECTED_COUNT -gt 1 ]; then
    echo -e "${MENU_INDEX}) ${BOLD}All detected platforms${RESET} (recommended - uses symlinks)"
    MENU_OPTIONS[$MENU_INDEX]="all"
    ALL_OPTION_INDEX=$MENU_INDEX
    MENU_INDEX=$((MENU_INDEX + 1))
fi

# Add "Custom selection" option if more than two
if [ $DETECTED_COUNT -gt 2 ]; then
    echo -e "${MENU_INDEX}) Custom selection"
    MENU_OPTIONS[$MENU_INDEX]="custom"
    MENU_INDEX=$((MENU_INDEX + 1))
fi

echo ""

# CI mode: select all platforms automatically
if [ "$CI_MODE" = true ]; then
    if [ $DETECTED_COUNT -eq 1 ]; then
        # Single platform: select it directly
        for platform in "${!PLATFORMS[@]}"; do
            SELECTED_OPTION="$platform"
            case $platform in
                claude) name="Claude Code" ;;
                kiro) name="Kiro (AWS)" ;;
                opencode) name="OpenCode" ;;
                cursor) name="Cursor" ;;
                vscode) name="VS Code" ;;
                codex) name="OpenAI Codex" ;;
                antigravity) name="Google Antigravity" ;;
                goose) name="Goose" ;;

            echo -e "${CYAN}CI mode:${RESET} Installing to ${name}"

    else
        # Multiple platforms: use "all" strategy
        echo -e "${CYAN}CI mode:${RESET} Installing to all detected platforms"
        SELECTED_OPTION="all"
    fi
else
    read -p "Choose (1-$((MENU_INDEX-1))): " CHOICE

    # Validate choice
    if [ -z "$CHOICE" ] || [ "$CHOICE" -lt 1 ] || [ "$CHOICE" -ge $MENU_INDEX ]; then
        echo -e "${RED}âœ—${RESET} Invalid choice"
        exit 1
    fi

    SELECTED_OPTION="${MENU_OPTIONS[$CHOICE]}"
fi

# Process selection
declare -A INSTALL_TO

if [ "$SELECTED_OPTION" = "all" ]; then
    # Install to all detected platforms
    for platform in "${!PLATFORMS[@]}"; do
        INSTALL_TO[$platform]=true
    done
    STRATEGY="symlink"
    echo ""
    echo -e "${BLUE}Strategy:${RESET} Install to ~/.wfc, symlink to all platforms"
elif [ "$SELECTED_OPTION" = "custom" ]; then
    # Custom selection
    echo ""
    echo -e "${BOLD}Select platforms (space-separated numbers):${RESET}"
    INDEX=1
    declare -A CUSTOM_MAP
    for platform in claude kiro opencode cursor vscode codex antigravity goose; do
        if [ "${PLATFORMS[$platform]}" = true ]; then
            case $platform in
                claude) name="Claude Code" ;;
                kiro) name="Kiro (AWS)" ;;
                opencode) name="OpenCode" ;;
                cursor) name="Cursor" ;;
                vscode) name="VS Code" ;;
                codex) name="OpenAI Codex" ;;
                antigravity) name="Google Antigravity" ;;
                goose) name="Goose" ;;
            esac
            echo -e "${INDEX}) ${name}"
            CUSTOM_MAP[$INDEX]=$platform
            INDEX=$((INDEX + 1))
        fi
    done
    echo ""
    read -p "Enter numbers: " -a CUSTOM_CHOICES

    for choice in "${CUSTOM_CHOICES[@]}"; do
        if [ -n "${CUSTOM_MAP[$choice]}" ]; then
            INSTALL_TO[${CUSTOM_MAP[$choice]}]=true
        fi
    done

    # Determine strategy
    INSTALL_COUNT=0
    for platform in "${!INSTALL_TO[@]}"; do
        INSTALL_COUNT=$((INSTALL_COUNT + 1))
    done

    if [ $INSTALL_COUNT -gt 1 ]; then
        STRATEGY="symlink"
    else
        STRATEGY="direct"
    fi
else
    # Single platform installation
    INSTALL_TO[$SELECTED_OPTION]=true
    STRATEGY="direct"
fi

echo ""

# ============================================================================
# CRITICAL FIX: Correct directory structure for Agent Skills
# ============================================================================

# Determine installation root
if [ "$STRATEGY" = "symlink" ]; then
    # Multi-platform: use ~/.wfc as source of truth
    WFC_ROOT="$HOME/.wfc"
    echo -e "${BLUE}Root directory:${RESET} $WFC_ROOT (source of truth)"
else
    # Direct install to single platform
    # CRITICAL: For single platform, install DIRECTLY to platform skills dir
    # NOT nested under a wfc/ subdirectory
    for platform in "${!INSTALL_TO[@]}"; do
        # Install directly to platform path, NOT nested
        WFC_ROOT="${PLATFORM_PATHS[$platform]}"
    done
    echo -e "${BLUE}Installing to:${RESET} $WFC_ROOT"
fi

# Create installation directory
mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT"

# Save branding mode config
cat > "$WFC_ROOT/.wfc_branding" <<EOF
# WFC Branding Configuration
# Generated by install-universal.sh v${VERSION}
mode=$WFC_MODE
name=$WFC_NAME
tagline=$WFC_TAGLINE
EOF

echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Saved branding mode: ${WFC_MODE}"

# Copy WFC files
echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ“¦ Installing WFC...${RESET}"
echo ""

# Determine source directory
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"

# ============================================================================
# CRITICAL FIX: Correct skill installation structure
# ============================================================================

echo "  â€¢ Installing skills..."

if [ "$STRATEGY" = "symlink" ]; then
    # Multi-platform: copy to ~/.wfc/skills first
    mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/skills"

    SKILLS_FOUND=0

    # Check local skills directory (in wfc/skills)
    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills" ]; then
        for skill_dir in "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills"/wfc-*; do
            if [ -d "$skill_dir" ]; then
                skill_name=$(basename "$skill_dir")
                echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name"
                # Remove old version if exists
                [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/skills/$skill_name" ] && rm -rf "$WFC_ROOT/skills/$skill_name"
                cp -r "$skill_dir" "$WFC_ROOT/skills/"
                SKILLS_FOUND=$((SKILLS_FOUND + 1))
            fi
        done
    fi

    # Check ~/.claude/skills for already installed WFC skills
    if [ -d "$HOME/.claude/skills" ]; then
        for skill_dir in "$HOME/.claude/skills"/wfc-*; do
            if [ -d "$skill_dir" ]; then
                skill_name=$(basename "$skill_dir")
                # Check if this is a meta-skill directory (contains sub-skills)
                if [ -d "$skill_dir/wkills" ]; then
                    # Meta-skill - install directly to skills root
                    target="$WFC_ROOT/skills/"
                    echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name (meta-skill from ~/.claude/skills)"
                    if [ ! -d "$target" ]; then
                        mkdir -p "$target"
                    fi
                    cp -r "$skill_dir"/* "$target/" 2>/dev/null || true
                    SKILLS_FOUND=$((SKILLS_FOUND + 1))
                else
                    # Regular skill - install in skills subdirectory
                    target="$WFC_ROOT/skills/"
                    if [ ! -d "$target/$skill_name" ]; then
                        mkdir -p "$target/$skill_name"
                        echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name"
                    else
                        echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name (already exists)"
                    fi
                fi
            fi
        done
    fi

    echo "  â€¢ Found $SKILLS_FOUND WFC skills"

    # Copy reviewers (5 fixed specialist reviewers)
    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/references/reviewers" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Installing reviewers..."
        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/reviewers"
        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/references/reviewers"/* "$WFC_ROOT/reviewers/"
    fi

    # Copy hooks infrastructure
    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Installing hook infrastructure..."
        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/scripts/hooks"
        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks"/* "$WFC_ROOT/scripts/hooks/"
    fi

    # Copy templates
    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/assets/templates" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Installing templates..."
        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/templates"
        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/assets/templates"/* "$WFC_ROOT/templates/"
    fi

    # Preserve user rules (never overwrite)
    if [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/rules" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Preserving user rules (.wfc/rules/)"
    fi

else
    # Direct mode: install skills DIRECTLY to platform skills directory
    # CRITICAL: Skills must be at ~/.claude/skills/wfc-*/ NOT ~/.claude/skills/wfc/skills/wfc-*/

    SKILLS_FOUND=0

    # Check local skills directory (in wfc/skills)
    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills" ]; then
        for skill_dir in "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills"/wfc-*; do
            if [ -d "$skill_dir" ]; then
                skill_name=$(basename "$skill_dir")
                target="$WFC_ROOT/$skill_name"
                echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name"
                # Remove old version if exists
                [ -d "$target" ] && rm -rf "$target"
                cp -r "$skill_dir" "$target"
                SKILLS_FOUND=$((SKILLS_FOUND + 1))
            fi
        done
    fi

    # Check ~/.claude/skills for already installed WFC skills
    if [ -d "$HOME/.claude/skills" ]; then
        for skill_dir in "$HOME/.claude/skills"/wfc-*; do
            if [ -d "$skill_dir" ]; then
                skill_name=$(basename "$skill_dir")
                target="$WFC_ROOT/$skill_name"
                if [ ! -d "$target" ]; then
                    echo "    â”œâ”€ $skill_name (from ~/.claude/skills)"
                    cp -r "$skill_dir" "$target"
                    SKILLS_FOUND=$((SKILLS_FOUND + 1))
                fi
            fi
        done
    fi

    echo "  â€¢ Found $SKILLS_FOUND WFC skills"

    # Copy reviewers (5 fixed specialist reviewers)
    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/references/reviewers" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Installing reviewers..."
        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/references/reviewers"
        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/references/reviewers"/* "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/references/reviewers/"
    fi

    # Copy hooks infrastructure
    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Installing hook infrastructure..."
        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/scripts/hooks"
        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks"/* "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/scripts/hooks/"
    fi

    # Copy templates
    if [ -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/assets/templates" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Installing templates..."
        mkdir -p "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/templates"
        cp -r "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/assets/templates"/* "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/templates/"
    fi

    # Preserve user rules (never overwrite)
    if [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/wfc/rules" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Preserving user rules (.wfc/rules/)"
    fi
fi

echo ""

# Create symlinks if multi-platform installation
if [ "$STRATEGY" = "symlink" ]; then
    echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ”— Creating symlinks...${RESET}"
    echo ""

    for platform in "${!INSTALL_TO[@]}"; do
        platform_path="${PLATFORM_PATHS[$platform]}"

        case $platform in
            claude) name="Claude Code" ;;
            kiro) name="Kiro" ;;
            opencode) name="OpenCode" ;;
            cursor) name="Cursor" ;;
            vscode) name="VS Code" ;;
            codex) name="OpenAI Codex" ;;
            antigravity) name="Google Antigravity" ;;
            goose) name="Goose" ;;
        esac

        echo -e "${CYAN}â†’ $name${RESET}"

        # Create platform skills directory
        mkdir -p "$platform_path"

        # Link each skill DIRECTLY to platform skills directory
        for skill in "$WFC_ROOT/skills"/wfc-*; do
            if [ -d "$skill" ]; then
                skill_name=$(basename "$skill")
                target="$platform_path/$skill_name"

                # Remove existing
                if [ -L "$target" ] || [ -d "$target" ]; then
                    rm -rf "$target"
                fi

                # Create symlink
                ln -s "$skill" "$target"
                echo "  â”œâ”€ $skill_name"
            fi
        done

        # Link shared resources
        target="$platform_path/wfc"
        mkdir -p "$target"

        # Remove existing symlinks
        [ -L "$target/personas" ] && rm "$target/personas"
        [ -L "$target/shared" ] && rm "$target/shared"
        [ -L "$target/scripts" ] && rm "$target/scripts"
        [ -L "$target/templates" ] && rm "$target/templates"

        # Create symlinks
        ln -sf "$WFC_ROOT/personas" "$target/personas"
        [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/shared" ] && ln -sf "$WFC_ROOT/shared" "$target/shared"
        [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/scripts" ] && ln -sf "$WFC_ROOT/scripts" "$target/scripts"
        [ -d "$WFC_ROOT/templates" ] && ln -sf "$WFC_ROOT/templates" "$target/templates"

        echo "  â””â”€ Shared resources (personas, hooks, templates)"
        echo ""
    done
fi

# ============================================================================
# HOOK REGISTRATION: Install PostToolUse quality hooks for Claude Code
# ============================================================================
if [ "${INSTALL_TO[claude]}" = true ] || [ "${PLATFORMS[claude]}" = true ]; then
    echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸª Registering PostToolUse quality hooks...${RESET}"
    echo ""

    HOOKS_SRC="$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/scripts/hooks"
    HOOKS_DEST="$HOME/.wfc/scripts/hooks"

    if [ -d "$HOOKS_SRC" ]; then
        mkdir -p "$HOOKS_DEST"
        mkdir -p "$HOOKS_DEST/_checkers"

        # Copy hook scripts
        for hook_file in file_checker.py tdd_enforcer.py context_monitor.py _util.py register_hooks.py; do
            if [ -f "$HOOKS_SRC/$hook_file" ]; then
                cp "$HOOKS_SRC/$hook_file" "$HOOKS_DEST/$hook_file"
                echo "    â”œâ”€ $hook_file"
            fi
        done

        # Copy language checkers
        for checker_file in __init__.py python.py typescript.py go.py; do
            if [ -f "$HOOKS_SRC/_checkers/$checker_file" ]; then
                cp "$HOOKS_SRC/_checkers/$checker_file" "$HOOKS_DEST/_checkers/$checker_file"
                echo "    â”œâ”€ _checkers/$checker_file"
            fi
        done

        # Copy security hooks
        for sec_file in pretooluse_hook.py security_hook.py rule_engine.py config_loader.py hook_state.py __init__.py __main__.py; do
            if [ -f "$HOOKS_SRC/$sec_file" ]; then
                cp "$HOOKS_SRC/$sec_file" "$HOOKS_DEST/$sec_file"
            fi
        done

        # Copy patterns
        if [ -d "$HOOKS_SRC/patterns" ]; then
            mkdir -p "$HOOKS_DEST/patterns"
            cp "$HOOKS_SRC/patterns"/*.json "$HOOKS_DEST/patterns/" 2>/dev/null || true
        fi

        echo -e "${GREEN}  âœ“${RESET} Quality hooks installed to ~/.wfc/scripts/hooks/"
    fi

    # Upsert WFC hooks into ~/.claude/settings.json (never clobbers existing settings)
    REGISTER_SCRIPT="$HOOKS_DEST/register_hooks.py"
    GLOBAL_SETTINGS="$HOME/.claude/settings.json"
    if [ -f "$REGISTER_SCRIPT" ]; then
        echo "  â€¢ Registering hooks in ~/.claude/settings.json (upsert)..."
        if command -v python3 >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            python3 "$REGISTER_SCRIPT" "$GLOBAL_SETTINGS"
            echo -e "${GREEN}  âœ“${RESET} Hooks registered (existing settings preserved)"
        elif command -v python >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            python "$REGISTER_SCRIPT" "$GLOBAL_SETTINGS"
            echo -e "${GREEN}  âœ“${RESET} Hooks registered (existing settings preserved)"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}  âš ${RESET} Python not found â€” run manually:"
            echo "      python3 $REGISTER_SCRIPT $GLOBAL_SETTINGS"
        fi
    fi

    echo ""
fi

# Success!
echo -e "${GREEN}${BOLD}âœ“ Installation complete!${RESET}"
echo ""

# Show installation summary
echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ“‹ Installation Summary${RESET}"
echo ""

if [ "$STRATEGY" = "symlink" ]; then
    echo -e "${BLUE}Source:${RESET} $WFC_ROOT"
    echo ""
    echo -e "${BLUE}Symlinked to:${RESET}"
    for platform in "${!INSTALL_TO[@]}"; do
        case $platform in
            claude) name="Claude Code" ;;
            kiro) name="Kiro" ;;
            opencode) name="OpenCode" ;;
            cursor) name="Cursor" ;;
            vscode) name="VS Code" ;;
            codex) name="OpenAI Codex" ;;
            antigravity) name="Google Antigravity" ;;
            goose) name="Goose" ;;
        esac
        echo -e "  â€¢ ${name}: ${PLATFORM_PATHS[$platform]}/wfc-*"
    done
    echo ""
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Note:${RESET} Updates to $WFC_ROOT automatically sync to all platforms"
else
    echo -e "${BLUE}Location:${RESET} $WFC_ROOT"
fi

echo ""
echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸŽ¯ Available Skills${RESET}"
echo ""
echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-review${RESET}       - Multi-agent consensus code review"
echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-implement${RESET}    - Parallel TDD implementation"
echo "  â€¢ ${CYAN}/wfc-plan${RESET}         - Structured task breakdown"

echo ""

for platform in "${!INSTALL_TO[@]}"; do

content.thinking:
Now I understand the install script. There are two install strategies:

1. **Direct install** (single platform): copies skills from `wfc/skills/wfc-*/` directly to `~/.claude/skills/wfc-*/`. Old skills are removed per-skill if they exist: `[ -d "$target" ] && rm -rf "$target"`. But this only removes skills that still exist in the repo â€” it doesn't remove skills that were deleted from the repo (like `wfc-isthissmart`).

2. **Symlink strategy** (multi-platform): copies to `~/.wfc/skills/` and symlinks to platforms. 

The issue is that both strategies leave stale skills behind. For the direct install, I need to scan the install directory after copying and remove any `wfc-*` directories that don't have a corresponding source in the repo. For the symlink strategy, I should do the same scan on the platform directory to clean up any orphaned symlinks or directories that no longer point to valid skills. Writing pruning logic... Still writing pruning logic... Finishing the cleanup logic...

content.text: I can see the pattern. The direct install removes skills that still exist (`rm -rf "$target"` before copy), but never cleans up skills that were deleted from the repo (like `wfc-isthissmart`). Same for the symlink strategy. I need to add a prune step to both paths.

toolUseResult.originalFile:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -e

# Require bash 4+ for associative arrays (declare -A)
if [ "${BASH_VERSINFO[0]}" -lt 4 ]; then
    for candidate in /opt/homebrew/bin/bash /usr/local/bin/bash; do
        if [ -x "$candidate" ]; then
            exec "$candidate" "$0" "$@"
        fi
    done
    echo "Error: bash 4+ required. Install with: brew install bash"
    exit 1
fi

# WFC Universal Installer - Agent Skills Standard Compatible
# Detects and installs to: Claude Code, Kiro, OpenCode, Cursor, VS Code, Codex, Antigravity
#
# Usage:
#   ./install-universal.sh              - Interactive (local clone)
#   ./install-universal.sh --ci         - Non-interactive CI mode
#   ./install-universal.sh --help       - Show help
#
# Remote install:
#   curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sam-fakhreddine/wfc/main/install-universal.sh | bash
#
# Features:
#   - Auto-detects installed Agent Skills platforms
#   - Supports 8+ platforms (Claude Code, Kiro, OpenCode, etc.)
#   - Remote install via curl pipe (clones repo to /tmp)
#   - Branding modes: SFW (Workflow Champion) or NSFW (World Fucking Class)
#   - PostToolUse quality hooks (auto-lint, TDD, context monitor)
#   - Reinstall options: refresh, change branding, or full reset
#   - Progressive disclosure (92% token reduction)
#   - Symlink support for multi-platform sync

VERSION="0.7.0"
REPO="sam-fakhreddine/wfc"
REPO_URL="https://github.com/${REPO}.git"

# Non-interactive mode flag
CI_MODE=false
if [ "$1" = "--ci" ] || [ "$1" = "--non-interactive" ]; then
    CI_MODE=true
fi

# Show help
if [ "$1" = "--help" ] || [ "$1" = "-h" ]; then
    cat << 'EOF'
WFC Universal Installer v0.6.0
==============================

USAGE:
    ./install.sh                 Interactive installation
    ./install.sh --help          Show this help
    ./install.sh --ci            Non-interactive CI mode

FEATURES:
    - Auto-detects Agent Skills platforms
    - Branding modes: SFW or NSFW
    - Reinstall options for existing installations
    - Multi-platform symlink support
    - Progressive disclosure (92% token reduction)

CI MODE:
    --ci flag enables non-interactive installation with these defaults:
    - Existing install: Refresh (keep settings)
    - Branding: NSFW (World Fucking Class)
    - Platform: All detected platforms (uses symlink strategy)

SUPPORTED PLATFORMS:
    - Claude Code     (~/.claude/skills)
    - Kiro (AWS)      (~/.kiro/skills)
    - OpenCode        (~/.opencode/skills)
    - Cursor          (~/.cursor/skills)
    - VS Code         (~/.vscode/skills)
    - OpenAI Codex    (~/.codex/skills)
    - Antigravity     (~/.antigravity/skills)
    - Goose           (~/.config/goose/skills)

REINSTALL OPTIONS:
    When existing installation detected:
    1. Refresh         - Update files, keep settings
    2. Change branding - Switch SFW/NSFW mode
    3. Full reinstall  - Reset all settings (with backup)
    4. Cancel          - Exit without changes

BRANDING MODES:
    SFW  (Safe For Work) - "Workflow Champion"
         Professional language, corporate-friendly

    NSFW (Default)       - "World Fucking Class"
         Original branding, no bullshit

DOCUMENTATION:
    Installation:  docs/workflow/UNIVERSAL_INSTALL.md
    Quick Start:   QUICKSTART.md

EOF
    exit 0
fi

BOLD="\033[1m"
GREEN="\033[0;32m"
BLUE="\033[0;34m"
YELLOW="\033[0;33m"
RED="\033[0;31m"
CYAN="\033[0;36m"
MAGENTA="\033[0;35m"
RESET="\033[0m"

# ============================================================================
# REMOTE INSTALL: If running via curl pipe, clone repo first
# ============================================================================
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" 2>/dev/null )" 2>/dev/null && pwd 2>/dev/null )" || SCRIPT_DIR=""
REMOTE_INSTALL=false

if [ -z "$SCRIPT_DIR" ] || [ ! -d "$SCRIPT_DIR/wfc/skills" ]; then
    # Running via curl pipe or from outside repo - clone to /tmp
    REMOTE_INSTALL=true
    CLONE_DIR="/tmp/wfc-install-$$"

    echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ“¡ Remote install - fetching WFC...${RESET}"

    if ! command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo -e "${RED}âœ—${RESET} git is required. Install git first."
        exit 1
    fi

    git clone --depth 1 "$REPO_URL" "$CLONE_DIR" 2>/dev/null
    SCRIPT_DIR="$CLONE_DIR"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} WFC fetched"
    echo ""

    # Cleanup on exit
    trap "rm -rf $CLONE_DIR" EXIT
fi

# ============================================================================
# DEPENDENCY CHECK
# ============================================================================
check_dependencies() {
    local missing=()

    if ! command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        missing+=("uv")
    fi
    if ! command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        missing+=("git")
    fi

    if [ ${#missing[@]} -gt 0 ]; then
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ${RESET}  Optional dependencies not found: ${missing[*]}"

        if [[ " ${missing[*]} " =~ " uv " ]]; then
            echo -e "   Install uv: ${CYAN}curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh${RESET}"
        fi
        echo ""
    fi

    # Check for quality tools (informational)
    local quality_tools=()
    command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("ruff")
    command -v black >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("black")
    command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("prettier")
    command -v eslint >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("eslint")
    command -v gofmt >/dev/null 2>&1 && quality_tools+=("gofmt")

    if [ ${#quality_tools[@]} -gt 0 ]; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Quality tools detected: ${quality_tools[*]}"
    fi
}

echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ† WFC Universal Installer v${VERSION}${RESET}"
echo -e "   ${CYAN}Agent Skills Standard Compatible${RESET}"
echo ""

check_dependencies

# Check for existing installation
EXISTING_INSTALL=false
EXISTING_BRANDING=""
EXISTING_MODE=""

if [ -d "$HOME/.wfc" ]; then
    EXISTING_INSTALL=true
    if [ -f "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" ]; then
        EXISTING_MODE=$(grep "^mode=" "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" | cut -d'=' -f2)
        EXISTING_BRANDING=$(grep "^name=" "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" | cut -d'=' -f2)
    fi
fi

# Reinstall options if existing installation detected
if [ "$EXISTING_INSTALL" = true ]; then
    if [ "$CI_MODE" = true ]; then
        # CI mode: always refresh
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ${RESET}  CI mode: Refreshing existing installation..."
        KEEP_SETTINGS=true
        if [ -n "$EXISTING_MODE" ]; then
            WFC_MODE="$EXISTING_MODE"
            if [ "$WFC_MODE" = "sfw" ]; then
                WFC_NAME="Workflow Champion"
                WFC_TAGLINE="Professional Multi-Agent Framework"
            else
                WFC_NAME="World Fucking Class"
                WFC_TAGLINE="Multi-Agent Framework That Doesn't Fuck Around"
            fi
        fi
    else
        # Interactive mode
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ${RESET}  Existing WFC installation detected"
        if [ -n "$EXISTING_BRANDING" ]; then
            echo -e "   Current: ${CYAN}$EXISTING_BRANDING${RESET} (${EXISTING_MODE})"
        fi
        echo ""
        echo -e "${BOLD}What would you like to do?${RESET}"
        echo ""
        echo -e "1) ${GREEN}Refresh installation${RESET} (keep current settings)"
        echo -e "   â””â”€ Update files, preserve branding and config"
        echo ""
        echo -e "2) ${YELLOW}Change branding mode${RESET}"
        echo -e "   â””â”€ Switch between SFW/NSFW, keep everything else"
        echo ""
        echo -e "3) ${RED}Full reinstall${RESET} (reset all settings)"
        echo -e "   â””â”€ Clean install, reconfigure everything"
        echo ""
        echo -e "4) ${BLUE}Cancel${RESET}"
        echo -e "   â””â”€ Exit without changes"
        echo ""
        read -p "Choose (1-4): " REINSTALL_CHOICE

        case $REINSTALL_CHOICE in
            1)
                # Refresh - keep existing settings
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Refreshing installation..."
                KEEP_SETTINGS=true
                if [ -n "$EXISTING_MODE" ]; then
                    WFC_MODE="$EXISTING_MODE"
                    if [ "$WFC_MODE" = "sfw" ]; then
                        WFC_NAME="Workflow Champion"
                        WFC_TAGLINE="Professional Multi-Agent Framework"
                    else
                        WFC_NAME="World Fucking Class"
                        WFC_TAGLINE="Multi-Agent Framework That Doesn't Fuck Around"
                    fi
                fi
                ;;
            2)
                # Change branding
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Changing branding mode..."
                KEEP_SETTINGS=true
                CHANGE_BRANDING=true
                ;;
            3)
                # Full reinstall
                echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ${RESET}  Full reinstall - backing up current config..."
                BACKUP_DIR="$HOME/.wfc_backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)"
                mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR"
                if [ -f "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" ]; then
                    cp "$HOME/.wfc/.wfc_branding" "$BACKUP_DIR/"
                fi
                # Backup user rules if they exist
                if [ -d "$HOME/.wfc/rules" ]; then
                    cp -r "$HOME/.wfc/rules" "$BACKUP_DIR/rules"
                    echo -e "   Backed up user rules"
                fi
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Backup saved to: ${CYAN}$BACKUP_DIR${RESET}"
                KEEP_SETTINGS=false
                ;;
            4)
                echo -e "${BLUE}Cancelled${RESET}"
                exit 0
                ;;
            *)
                echo -e "${RED}âœ—${RESET} Invalid choice"
                exit 1
                ;;
        esac
        echo ""
    fi
fi

# Branding mode selection (skip if keeping settings and not changing)
if [ "${KEEP_SETTINGS:-false}" = false ] || [ "${CHANGE_BRANDING:-false}" = true ]; then
    if [ "$CI_MODE" = true ]; then
        # CI mode: default to NSFW
        WFC_NAME="World Fucking Class"
        WFC_ACRONYM="WFC"
        WFC_TAGLINE="Multi-Agent Framework That Doesn't Fuck Around"

    else

        echo -e "   â””â”€ Professional language, corporate-friendly"
        echo ""
        echo -e "2) ${BOLD}NSFW${RESET} (Default)        â†’ ${MAGENTA}World Fucking Class${RESET}"
        echo -e "   â””â”€ Original branding, no bullshit"
        echo ""
        read -p "Choose mode (1-2) [default: 2]: " BRANDING_CHOICE

        case $BRANDING_CHOICE in

                WFC_NAME="Workflow Champion"
                WFC_ACRONYM="WFC"
                WFC_TAGLINE="Professional Multi-Agent Framework"
                WFC_MODE="sfw"
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Selected: ${GREEN}Workflow Champion${RESET} (SFW)"
                ;;
            2|"")
                WFC_NAME="World Fucking Class"
                WFC_ACRONYM="WFC"
                WFC_TAGLINE="Multi-Agent Framework That Doesn't Fuck Around"
                WFC_MODE="nsfw"
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Selected: ${MAGENTA}World Fucking Class${RESET} (NSFW)"
                ;;
            *)
                echo -e "${RED}âœ—${RESET} Invalid choice, defaulting to NSFW"
                WFC_NAME="World Fucking Class"
                WFC_ACRONYM="WFC"
                WFC_TAGLINE="Multi-Agent Framework That Doesn't Fuck Around"
                WFC_MODE="nsfw"
                ;;
        esac
    fi
fi

echo ""
echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ† Installing ${WFC_NAME}${RESET}"
echo -e "   ${WFC_TAGLINE}"
echo -e "   ${CYAN}Agent Skills Standard Compatible${RESET}"
echo ""

# Platform detection
declare -A PLATFORMS
declare -A PLATFORM_PATHS

# Detect all Agent Skills compatible platforms
echo -e "${BOLD}ðŸ” Detecting installed platforms...${RESET}"
echo ""

# Claude Code
if [ -d "$HOME/.claude" ]; then
    PLATFORMS[claude]=true
    PLATFORM_PATHS[claude]="$HOME/.claude/skills"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Claude Code"
    echo -e "  â””â”€ Skills: ${BLUE}~/.claude/skills/${RESET}"
fi

# Kiro (AWS)
if [ -d "$HOME/.kiro" ]; then
    PLATFORMS[kiro]=true
    PLATFORM_PATHS[kiro]="$HOME/.kiro/skills"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Kiro (AWS)"
    echo -e "  â””â”€ Skills: ${BLUE}~/.kiro/skills/${RESET}"
fi

# OpenCode
if [ -d "$HOME/.config/opencode" ] || [ -d "$HOME/.opencode" ]; then
    PLATFORMS[opencode]=true
    if [ -d "$HOME/.config/opencode" ]; then
        PLATFORM_PATHS[opencode]="$HOME/.config/opencode/skills"
    else
        PLATFORM_PATHS[opencode]="$HOME/.opencode/skills"
    fi
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} OpenCode"
    echo -e "  â””â”€ Skills: ${BLUE}${PLATFORM_PATHS[opencode]}${RESET}"
fi

# Cursor
if [ -d "$HOME/.cursor" ] || [ -d "$HOME/Library/Application Support/Cursor" ]; then
    PLATFORMS[cursor]=true
    if [ -d "$HOME/.cursor" ]; then
        PLATFORM_PATHS[cursor]="$HOME/.cursor/skills"
    else

    fi
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} Cursor"
    echo -e "  â””â”€ Skills: ${BLUE}${PLATFORM_PATHS[cursor]}${RESET}"
fi

# VS Code
if [ -d "$HOME/.vscode" ] || [ -d "$HOME/Library/Application Support/Code" ]; then
    PLATFORMS[vscode]=true
    if [ -d "$HOME/.vscode" ]; then
        PLATFORM_PATHS[vscode]="$HOME/.vscode/skills"
    else

    fi
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ“${RESET} VS Code"
    echo -e "  â””â”€ Skills: ${BLUE}${PLATFORM_PATHS[vscode]}${RESET}"
fi

# OpenAI Codex
if [ -d "$HOME/.codex" ] || [ -d "$HOME/.openai/codex" ]; then
    PLATFORMS[codex]=true
    if [ -d "$HOME/.codex" ]; then
        PLATFORM_PATHS[codex]="$HOME/.codex/skills"

    echo -e "  â””â”€ Skills: ${BLUE}${PLATFORM_PATHS[codex]}${RESET}"
fi

# Google Antigravity
if [ -d "$HOME/.antigravity" ] || [ -d "$HOME/.config/antigravity" ]; then
    PLATFORMS[antigravity]=true
    if [ -d "$HOME/.antigravity" ]; then
        PLATFORM_PATHS[antigravity]="$HOME/.antigravity/skills"
    else

    fi
